description:
Search and download torrents from multiple sources

Torrent Search is a modern Material 3 design Android app to search and download torrents from multiple providers.


Features:

  • Modern Material 3 design UI
  • Different category selections
  • Detailed view of search results
  • Bookmark/Download torrent
  • Copy/share magnet link
  • Open torrent description page
  • Copy/share torrent description page URL
  • Safe mode option
  • Option to enable or disable individual providers
  • Jackett/Prowlarr/other *arr service integration using Torznab API

Disclaimer:

This app does not host, store, or distribute any torrent files or copyrighted content; it only searches publicly available content from third-party sources. The developer is not responsible for how users access or use this information.

Use at your own risk and ensure compliance with applicable laws.
